ygData.subject: Re: Astrotrain
ygData.msgSnippet: Wildrider keeps pulling stuff out, then takes a second to wipe his brow. It will be kind of hard to show them to Megatron right now. he said, nonchallantly.

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Wildrider keeps pulling stuff out, then takes a second to wipe his brow.
"It will be kind of hard to show them to Megatron right now." he said,
nonchallantly. He then pointed over to charred bushes, ripped up earth,
and craters in the ground. Between all the destruction, Megatron was
seen, locked in conflict with another robot. Wildrider looks for a
second, then gets back to work of clearing out. "You know if you
Terrorcons aren't busy you can help." He says, to the two loafing robots
near the base. 

"Sinnertwin not want to help." groaned the Yellow one, as he looked to
Rippersnapper.
